detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in washed cotton denim with a resort collar, press-studs down the front, an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton knit. Jumper with buttons down one side and long raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Sandals in imitation suede with covered block heels and wide straps at the top that tie around the ankles. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane soles. Heel 8 cm.
Fleece-lined, patterned wellingtons with removable fleece insoles, a loop at the back and chunky soles.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a frill trim and ties at the top and a V-shaped opening. Pleats at the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, a seam under the bust and a flare to the hem.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend. Deep neckline front and back and covered elastication at the hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a racer back and twisted side seams. Folded and glued edges for optimum comfort.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with a foldover top, long sleeves that flare at the cuffs, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dungaree dress and bodysuit in organic cotton. Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable straps with press-stud fasteners. Soft brushed inside. Short-sleeved body in patterned jersey with an embroidered lace trim around the neckline and sleeves, and press-studs at the shoulder and crotch.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a square neckline front and back and wide shoulder straps. Lined bodice.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a button-down collar with concealed buttoning, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pyjama bottoms in soft satin with an elasticated drawstring waist, small frill trim at the top and wide, straight legs with lace-trimmed hems.
Soft suede sandals with straps that tie around the leg and wedge heels covered in braided jute. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 12.5 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.
Slip-on trainers with elastication and a decoration at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequin motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and no buttons. Lined.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back, canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Dress in woven fabric with a unique nursing feature, a collar, and long sleeves with a tab and button. Seam at the waist and side pockets. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short, double-layered top in fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and an opening at the hem at the back.

Blouse in woven fabric with short, flounced sleeves and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke at the front with pin-tucks and lace insets. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Jacquard-knit jumper in soft cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a T-shirt, shorts and fisherman’s hat in cotton jersey. T-shirt with buttons on one shoulder. Shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Hat with ties under the chin.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist and zip fly with a button. Decorative seams on the back pockets and skinny legs with a section with embroidered sequins on the knees and raw-edge hems.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, frill-trimmed side pockets and tapered legs. Soft brushed inside.
Voluminous, A-line, knee-length dress in a crisp Tencel™ lyocell and nylon weave with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps that join to form a racer back. Unlined.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Glasses with metal frames and clear lenses.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Small, glittery shoulder bag with a zip at the top and narrow shoulder strap. Embroidery and appliqués on the front and a faux fur pompom. Lined. Size 11x14.5 cm.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar with a zip at the front and a kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck jersey T-shirt in a stretch cotton blend. Slim fit.
Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit bodice, motif on the front, gathered seam at the hips and gently flared, patterned skirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Top in woven fabric with wide smocking over the bust. Double-layered frill trim at the top, narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a flared peplum.

Underwired, push-up lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable, partially lace-covered shoulder straps that cross at the back and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable imitation leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap 1.2 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.8 cm.
Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide elastic waistband. Mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Fully lined swimsuit in UV-protective material with a textured finish. Zip down the front with a chin guard and 3/4-length sleeves. UPF 50.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and tie detail at the hem.
Imitation leather sandals with decorative studs, adjustable straps at the top with concealed elastication and metal buckles, and rubber soles.
Court shoes with pointed toes and block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.

Voluminous, calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave. Elastication and a flounced trim at the top, 3/4-length balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps, raw, scalloped edges and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck.
Vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket.
Sunglasses with thin metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with elbow-length puff sleeves that finish with narrow elastication. Open section at the back with ties at the back of the neck and middle of the back, and a seam at the waist with a peplum.

Short, wide dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a small, frilled collar, V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, a seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Partly lined in satin.

Sleeveless tulle dress with a bodice embroidered with reversible sequins that have one matt side and one shiny side to create a shimmering effect. Seam at the waist with a glittery elastic waistband and a tiered skirt in layers of tulle to create volume and movement. Jersey lining.
Metal keyring with an imitation leather card holder with a scalloped flap and press-stud. Size 7x10 cm.

LIMITED EDITION. Long, sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe with a V-neck and flounces at the top. Small opening at the back with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and concealed zip, a seam at the waist and straight-cut skirt that flares gently at the hem. Lined.
Cropped top in an airy rib knit with flounced shoulder straps and a flounce at the top.
Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Paper straw earrings decorated with beads and sparkly stones. Length approx. 6.5 cm
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Cargo shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend containing glittery threads with scalloped tops.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length coat in a stretch cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons and side pockets. Long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-studs at the cuffs, and a pleat at the back. Unlined.
